summary:
## üö¶ Auto-Stop & Service Control

- Auto-stop now **ignores invalid/missing catalog entries** instead of counting them as failures.
- Skipped items log as **informational** with reasons; only actionable services affect success/warning counts.
- Added a **runtime service resolver** to validate service IDs by service name + display name and dispose controllers correctly.
- Auto-stop uses the resolver to stop only resolvable services and tags missing/not-installed entries as skipped.
- Added **task-stop support**:
  - New task controller handles wildcard matching, stop/disable via `schtasks`
  - Auto-stop routes task-like entries to task controller
  - DI updated to include task controller

---

## ‚ö° Performance Lab (New)

- Added a new **Performance Lab** page with guardrails, hero metrics, grouped tweak cards, and a safe ‚Äúdry run‚Äù mode.
- Ultimate Performance plan automation + **selective service slimming** with exportable before/after states.
- **Hardware Reserved Memory fixer** (detect + reverse truncation, remove memory compression, guide misconfig resets).
- Kernel & Boot controls: tick/clock toggles, `tscsyncpolicy` presets, `linearaddress57` support - all restore-point gated.
- **VBS/HVCI disable path** with detection, registry/bcd commands, warnings, and reboot guidance.
- ETW cleanup: stop/purge sessions safely, reseal defaults with one-click.
- Pagefile & memory tuning: NVMe relocation + presets, EmptyWorkingSet sweep, and automatic safety warnings.
- Scheduler & Affinity toolbox: per-app templates, priority/affinity presets, and built-in stress harness.
- Monitoring & Auto-Tune loop: lightweight sampler reacts to gaming apps, applies presets, logs changes, supports revert.
